participant_1.name: Isabella Columbus
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and passionate about culture, Isabella enjoys sharing her heritage and culinary skills.
participant_1.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.

participant_2.name: James Carter
participant_2.personality: Caring and reflective, James believes in giving back to the community and loves sharing stories from his past.
participant_2.background: i like watching war documentaries. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i'm a retired gym teacher.
